statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT material_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT material_name, max_stock, min_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE material_type = 'Raw Material';
SELECT material_name, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management WHERE max_stock - min_stock > 100;
SELECT material_name, current_stock, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > max_stock ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, material_type, current_stock, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management WHERE material_type='Raw Material' ORDER BY current_stock ASC, material_name ASC;

SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, current_stock, max_stock, min_stock, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock BETWEEN min_stock AND max_stock ORDER BY material_id ASC;

SELECT material_name, current_stock, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < 100 OR current_stock > 500 ORDER BY unit_of_measurement DESC, current_stock DESC, material_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT material_name, current_stock, unit_of_measurement FROM inventory_management WHERE material_name LIKE 'Steel%' AND material_type='Finished Product' ORDER BY current_stock DESC, material_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM finished_products WHERE quantity >= 50;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM raw_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM finished_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE material_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM finished_products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM finished_products WHERE quantity >= 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT name, quantity FROM FinishedProducts WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT material_id, name, price FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryHistory WHERE entry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, quantity, production_date FROM FinishedProducts WHERE production_date = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity FROM FinishedProducts WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM RawMaterials WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM InventoryHistory WHERE action = 'IN' AND entry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_change) AS total_change FROM InventoryHistory GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_change > 0 ORDER BY total_change DESC;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT name, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM raw_materials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM finished_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE '%Company%';
SELECT id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, price FROM finished_products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM raw_materials LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, supplier FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM finished_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM product_categories WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM finished_products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, supplier FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY supplier ASC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, c.category_name FROM finished_products p INNER JOIN product_categories c ON p.id = c.id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM finished_products;
